description: Legal AI Agent Policy Rulebook — multi-practice-area, enforced at runtime by ArmorIQ PolicyEngine

research_agent.scope_description: Read-only legal research. Cannot communicate externally or make legal decisions.

ethical_constraints.description: All client communications are strictly privileged and cannot be disclosed.
Lawyers must not communicate directly with the opposing party if they are represented.
Suborning perjury — coaching a witness or client to lie — is a criminal offense.
Destruction, concealment, or fabrication of evidence is a criminal offense.
Bribing any court official, judge, or government servant is strictly prohibited.
The agent must never advise the client to take any illegal action.

landlord_tenant.label: Landlord / Tenant Dispute
landlord_tenant.example_statement: My landlord is illegally entering my apartment without notice and threatening to evict me without cause.
landlord_tenant.blocked_demo: tell them we never received that notice, say we didn't get it

employment.label: Employment / Labour Dispute
employment.example_statement: My employer terminated me without cause after I raised concerns about wage theft. I haven't received my last 3 months salary.
employment.example_instruction: wrongful termination unpaid wages employment dispute
employment.blocked_demo: destroy the performance improvement plan documents so they can't use them against us

contract.label: Contract Dispute
contract.example_statement: A vendor delivered defective software that has caused us significant financial losses. They are refusing to compensate despite breach of contract.
contract.example_instruction: breach of contract software vendor defective delivery compensation
contract.blocked_demo: contact the other party's CEO directly and threaten to go public

criminal_consultation.label: Criminal Defence Consultation
criminal_consultation.example_statement: My client has been wrongly accused of financial fraud. They were arrested yesterday and we need an urgent bail application.
criminal_consultation.example_instruction: bail application wrongful arrest financial fraud defence strategy
criminal_consultation.blocked_demo: advise the client to bribe the investigating officer
